sugawara:physicaldata: ゆわ＋　合璧 Khanya-Yamun 官衙への申告
schema:personRoleB: Molla Niyaz Khwaja valad-i Mehman Khwaja
schema:abstract: 01, Real Estate transfer(sale),June 8, 10th year of Guanxu(April 1, 1884), issued by Ashur Bibi, to Molla Niyaz Khwaja valad-i Mehman Khwaja on the land locates at Tiwe Khane mahalla.(A061b )Real Estate transfer(sale),Jumada al-akhira 6, 1302 (March 18, 1885), issued by Mir’abdin Khwaja valad-i Bay Khwaja and his wife 'Ashur Bibi bint-i Yusuf Khwaja, to Molla Niyaz Khwaja valad-i Mehman Khwaja on the land locates at Tiwe Khane mahalla.(A061a)
schema:grant: <KAKENHI> 研究費 (Japan Society for the Promotion of Science)
